bibl.title: Postcard from W.H. Lowdermilk & Co. to [Philip Showalter Hench], December 10, 1941

div1.p: Lowdermilk & Co. informs [Hench] that they are sending him three volumes of Cuban medical reports..

div1.head: Postcard from W.H. Lowdermilk & Co. to [Philip Showalter Hench], December 10, 1941
div1.opener:
W. H. LOWDERMILK & CO.
1418 F STREET, N. W.
TELEPHONE NATIONAL 0613
Old Choice and Rare Books.
New Books Supplied on Order.
Government Publications. Books Bought.
Washington, D. C.,12/10 1941.
Dear Sir,
div1.p:
We are sending, under separate
cover the only three vols. containing
Cuban medical reports between the
years 1898 - 1902. which we can supply We will ask that
you return within three days of receipt
those which you do not desire
to keep.
